Is that a Tuatara?

Just like the coelocanths, they are living fossil, and the only surviving member of their kind. Not lizards, though.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539ce8156368727d86bd0200#post_539ce8156368727d86bd0200


wish it was easy.

at this point have lost some interest in mlp, which makes me only part of 1 fandom, which is the tf2 one (is there any tf2 forumslike these, like not only about tf2)  and im also ALL into rap and shit, but the only forum i know is rap genius, and the forum its pretty archachicin design. and most of the people there are like really really really into rap, seems like they care little about other things (these guys download like 11 mixtapes a day)
and then the rest is videogames.

i was looking for a forum like this, evne if it is about mlp, that has sections for RP, or random talk, since these have been really quiet these days cause vacations.
